vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.payout (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#102-107) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#105)

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.loseWager (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#115-119) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#116)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#78-96) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#109-113):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#110)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#111)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#115-119):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#116)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#117)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version

	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#1): it allows old versions
